definition: warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if

sentences.english: Every morning young pioneers go to school in file.
sentences.chinese: 每天早晨少先隊員們排着兩列縱隊去上學。

sentences.english: Some are under cover forming the enemys fifth column.
sentences.chinese: 有些是祕密的這就是敵人的第五縱隊。

sentences.english: The PLA men launched a converging attack on the enemy force in many column.
sentences.chinese: 人民解放軍對敵人的多個縱隊進行了集中兵力的進攻。

sentences.english: The smaller male leads a female on a single file march.
sentences.chinese: 這隻較小的雄性領着一隻雌性列成縱隊前進。

sentences.english: In columns rise and fall to the undulations of the ground.
sentences.chinese: 縱隊起伏哪怕灰壕泥波弄髒咱的身。

sentences.english: A popular longways is called the Virginia reel.
sentences.chinese: 其中一種流行的縱隊舞叫維吉尼亞里爾舞。

sentences.english: Shandong encirclement and suppression of column of the strategic plan is in abeyance.
sentences.chinese: 圍剿的山東縱隊的戰略計劃暫時擱置。

sentences.english: Use five or six columns to hold off and attack enemy reinforcements.
sentences.chinese: 以五個至六個縱隊，擔任阻援和打援。

sentences.english: Standard of Mongolia the field battle troops be ridden soldier's column of troops by 3 to constitute.
sentences.chinese: 標準的蒙古野戰部隊由三個騎兵縱隊組成。

sentences.english: Behind the vanguard were 38 columns guarding 38 four-horse chariots.
sentences.chinese: 在前鋒的後面是38列縱隊，護衛着38輛四馬戰車。

sentences.english: Terry's column was to join him in two days.
sentences.chinese: 泰瑞的縱隊將於兩天之後加入他。

sentences.english: All our columns are composed solely of old soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 我們所有的縱隊全是由老戰士組成。

sentences.english: Waves of rocket-carrying aircraft pounded at the enemy columns.
sentences.chinese: 一批批攜帶火箭的飛機不斷轟擊敵人的縱隊。

sentences.english: When running with a group in a very busy area, run single file.
sentences.chinese: 如果是與團隊奔跑在一繁忙的街區，要排成一列縱隊。
